title: Augusta County: C. Smiley to Thomas M. Smiley, [1861]
summary: In this letter to her son Thomas, C. Smiley writes of Thomas' recent illness and the increasing interest in religion displayed among neighbors. In addition, she implores him to connect himself with the church and trust in God.
keywords: An archivist or family member wrote "[1861]" to the top of the letter.
